examples.example: 这一届的学生们都非常努力且充满朝气。

translate.english: The students of this session are all very hardworking and full of vitality.

examples.example: 每一届的奥运会都展现了运动员们拼搏向上的精神风貌。

translate.english: Every session of the Olympic Games shows the hardworking and upward spirit of the athletes.

examples.example: 每一届的毕业生都怀揣着梦想迈向新的征程。

translate.english: Every graduating class is filled with dreams and steps into a new journey.
